DOC.brief_summary: To date , relationship omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( n-3 PUFAs ) cognitively intact individual examine limited number study ; present unknown whether supplementation n-3 PUFAs improve cognitive function mood population . Further , still remain established whether relationship exist peripheral fatty acid status—reflective dietary n-3 PUFA intake—and cognitive function population . The current study therefore aim address issue explore relationship serum PUFAs specific cognitive function sample healthy adult . To end , participant complete range cognitive task evaluate performance across domain attention , memory executive function . Self-report mood assessment include secondary measure .
DOC.brief_title: Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids ( PUFA ) Status Cognitive Function Healthy Young Adults
DOC.criteria: Male/Female 1835 year Healthy No herbal supplements/prescription medication ( excl . contraceptive pill ) Non smoker Native English speaker BMI ≥ 30
